name: floweret
description: Runtime signature type checker using native JavaScript types.
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.bundle: npm run build && cd benchmark && rollup -c
scripts.sizes-webpack: cd benchmark && echo 'No type Checking:' && size-limit no-type-checking.js && echo 'Floweret:' && size-limit floweret.js && echo 'Runtypes:' && size-limit runtypes.js && echo 'Flow-runtime:' && size-limit flow-runtime.js
scripts.sizes-rollup: cd benchmark/bundles && stat -c '%n %sÂ bytes' *.gz | sort -n -k 2 | column -t && echo
scripts.benchmark: npm run bundle && npm run sizes-rollup && cd benchmark/bundles && node no-type-checking-benchmark.min.js && node floweret-benchmark.min.js && node runtypes.min.js && node flow-runtime-benchmark.min.js && echo
scripts.link: mkdir -p dist && cp package.json dist && cd dist && npm link && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && cd .. && npm link floweret
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && npm publish
